name: UpdateIncidentServiceImpact
description:
Update the impact of an incident on a business service.

Use this tool to change the impact level of a specific incident on a specified business service. Useful for managing and communicating the effects of incidents within an organization. Requires appropriate OAuth permissions.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the incident resource to update impact.

parameters.name: business_service_id
parameters.description: The ID of the specific business service affected by the incident.

parameters.name: accept_versioning_header
parameters.description: Specify the API version in the `Accept` header for versioning purposes.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: impact_relation
parameters.description: Indicate if the business service is 'impacted' or 'not_impacted' by the incident. This changes the impact propagation to other services.

value_schema.description:
The `impacted` relation will cause the Business Service and any Services that it supports to become impacted by this incident.

The `not_impacted` relation will remove the Incident's Impact from the specified Business Service.

The effect of adding or removing Impact to a Business Service in this way will also change the propagation of Impact to other Services supported by that Business Service.
